verses.verse: Wherefore <WH199>, I-yov <WH347>, I pray thee, hear <WH8085> <WH8798> my speeches <WH4405>, and hearken <WH238> <WH8685> to all my words <WH1697>.
Behold, now I have opened <WH6605> <WH8804> my mouth <WH6310>, my tongue <WH3956> hath spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> in my mouth <WH2441>.
My words <WH561> shall be of the uprightness <WH3476> of my heart <WH3820>: and my lips <WH8193> shall utter <WH4448> <WH8765> knowledge <WH1847> clearly <WH1305> <WH8803>.
The Spirit <WH7307> of 'Elohim <WH410> hath made <WH6213> <WH8804> me, and the breath <WH5397> of 'El SHaddai <WH7706> hath given me life <WH2421> <WH8762>.
If thou canst <WH3201> <WH8799> answer <WH7725> <WH8687> me, set thy words in order <WH6186> <WH8798> before <WH6440> me, stand up <WH3320> <WH8690>.
Behold, I am according to thy wish <WH6310> in 'Elohim's <WH410> stead: I also am formed <WH7169> <WH8795> out of the clay <WH2563>.
Behold, my terror <WH367> shall not make thee afraid <WH1204> <WH8762>, neither shall my hand <WH405> be heavy <WH3513> <WH8799> upon thee.
Surely thou hast spoken <WH559> <WH8804> in mine hearing <WH241>, and I have heard <WH8085> <WH8799> the voice <WH6963> of thy words <WH4405>, saying,
I am clean <WH2134> without transgression <WH6588>, I am innocent <WH2643>; neither is there iniquity <WH5771> in me.
Behold, he findeth <WH4672> <WH8799> occasions <WH8569> against me, he counteth <WH2803> <WH8799> me for his enemy <WH341> <WH8802>,
He putteth <WH7760> <WH8799> my feet <WH7272> in the stocks <WH5465>, he marketh <WH8104> <WH8799> all my paths <WH734>.
Behold, in this thou art not just <WH6663> <WH8804>: I will answer <WH6030> <WH8799> thee, that 'Elohim <WH433> is greater <WH7235> <WH8799> than man <WH582>.
Why dost thou strive <WH7378> <WH8804> against him? for he giveth not account <WH6030> <WH8799> of any of his matters <WH1697>.
For 'Elohim <WH410> speaketh <WH1696> <WH8762> once <WH259>, yea twice <WH8147>, yet man perceiveth <WH7789> <WH8799> it not.
In a dream <WH2472>, in a vision <WH2384> of the night <WH3915>, when deep <WH8639> sleep falleth <WH5307> <WH8800> upon men <WH582>, in slumberings <WH8572> upon the bed <WH4904>;
Then he openeth <WH1540> <WH8799> the ears <WH241> of men <WH582>, and sealeth <WH2856> <WH8799> their instruction <WH4561>,
That he may withdraw <WH5493> <WH8687> man <WH120> from his purpose <WH4639>, and hide <WH3680> <WH8762> pride <WH1466> from man <WH1397>.
He keepeth back <WH2820> <WH8799> his soul <WH5315> from the pit <WH7845>, and his life <WH2416> from perishing <WH5674> <WH8800> by the sword <WH7973>.
He is chastened <WH3198> <WH8717> also with pain <WH4341> upon his bed <WH4904>, and the multitude <WH7230> <WH8675> <WH7379> of his bones <WH6106> with strong <WH386> pain:
So that his life <WH2416> abhorreth <WH2092> <WH8765> bread <WH3899>, and his soul <WH5315> dainty <WH8378> meat <WH3978>.
His flesh <WH1320> is consumed away <WH3615> <WH8799>, that it cannot be seen <WH7210>; and his bones <WH6106> that were not seen <WH7200> <WH8795> stick out <WH8192> <WH8795> <WH8675> <WH8205>.
Yea, his soul <WH5315> draweth near <WH7126> <WH8799> unto the grave <WH7845>, and his life <WH2416> to the destroyers <WH4191> <WH8688>.
If there <WH3426> be a messenger <WH4397> with him, an interpreter <WH3887> <WH8688>, one <WH259> among a thousand <WH505>, to shew <WH5046> <WH8687> unto man <WH120> his uprightness <WH3476>:

Then he is gracious <WH2603> <WH8799> unto him, and saith <WH559> <WH8799>, Deliver <WH6308> <WH8798> him from going down <WH3381> <WH8800> to the pit <WH7845>: I have found <WH4672> <WH8804> a ransom <WH3724>.
His flesh <WH1320> shall be fresher <WH7375> <WH8738> than a child's <WH5290>: he shall return <WH7725> <WH8799> to the days <WH3117> of his youth <WH5934>:

He shall pray <WH6279> <WH8799> unto 'Elohim <WH433>, and he will be favourable <WH7521> <WH8799> unto him: and he shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> his face <WH6440> with joy <WH8643>: for he will render <WH7725> <WH8686> unto man <WH582> his righteousness <WH6666>.

He looketh <WH7789> <WH8799> upon men <WH582>, and if any say <WH559> <WH8799>, I have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, and perverted <WH5753> <WH8689> that which was right <WH3477>, and it profited <WH7737> <WH8804> me not;
He will deliver <WH6299> <WH8804> his soul <WH5315> from going <WH5674> <WH8800> into the pit <WH7845>, and his life <WH2416> shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> the light <WH216>.
Lo, all these things worketh <WH6466> <WH8799> 'Elohim <WH410> oftentimes <WH6471> <WH7969> with man <WH1397>,
To bring back <WH7725> <WH8687> his soul <WH5315> from the pit <WH7845>, to be enlightened <WH215> <WH8736> with the light <WH216> of the living <WH2416>.
Mark well <WH7181> <WH8685>, O I-yov <WH347>, hearken <WH8085> <WH8798> unto me: hold thy peace <WH2790> <WH8685>, and I will speak <WH1696> <WH8762>.
If thou hast <WH3426> any thing to say <WH4405>, answer <WH7725> <WH8685> me: speak <WH1696> <WH8761>, for I desire <WH2654> <WH8804> to justify <WH6663> <WH8763> thee.
If not, hearken <WH8085> <WH8798> unto me: hold thy peace <WH2790> <WH8685>, and I shall teach <WH502> <WH8762> thee wisdom <WH2451>.
